meanings.sent1: Many astronomers use telescopes to study the stars.
meanings.sent2: The astronomers gathered data about the planets in our solar system.
meanings.sent3: The astronomers had a star-gazing party and had a blast!
meanings.sent4: The astronomers' curiosity was like a never-ending journey through the universe.
meanings.sent5: The astronomers' passion for the cosmos was evident in their late-night observations.

meanings.definition: Those who observe celestial bodies and phenomena.
meanings.sent1: The astronomers spotted a comet streaking across the night sky.
meanings.sent2: Many astronomers travel to remote locations for better stargazing opportunities.
meanings.sent3: The astronomers were over the moon when they discovered a new galaxy.
meanings.sent4: The astronomers' dedication to their work was as bright as the stars they studied.
meanings.sent5: The astronomers' discoveries illuminated the mysteries of the universe.
